pricingComparisonContent.subHeader: competitively priced translation and localisation services,

card_1.title: standard translation
card_1.par_1: our standard translation service is perfect for general texts that do not require specialist knowledge. we work with a range of industries and languages, providing high-quality translations that are both accurate and culturally sensitive.

card_2.title: copywriting and localisation
